verses.verse: <S%H238>Hear<s%> my <S%H8451>teaching,<s%> my <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H5186>Turn<s%> your <S%H241>ears<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
I will <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in a <S%H4912>parable.<s%> I will <S%H5042>utter<s%> dark <S%H2420>sayings<s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%>
Which we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> and <S%H3045>known,<s%> and our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have told <S%H5608>us.<s%>

We will not <S%H3582>hide<s%> them from their <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H5608>telling<s%> to the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> his <S%H5807>strength,<s%> and his wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%> that he has <S%H6213>done.<s%>

For he <S%H6965>established<s%> a <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H7760>appointed<s%> a <S%H8451>teaching<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> that they should make them <S%H3045>known<s%> to their <S%H1121>children;<s%>

that the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> might <S%H3045>know,<s%> even the <S%H1121>children<s%> who should be <S%H3205>born;<s%> who should <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H5608>tell<s%> their <S%H1121>children,<s%>

that they might <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H3689>hope<s%> in <S%H430>God,<s%> and not <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H4611>works<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> but <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%>

and might not be as their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> a <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> and <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H1755>generation,<s%> a <S%H1755>generation<s%> that <S%H3559>didn't<s%> make their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H3559>loyal,<s%> whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was not <S%H539>steadfast<s%> with <S%H410>God.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> being <S%H5401>armed<s%> and <S%H7411>carrying<s%> <S%H7198>bows,<s%> turned <S%H2015>back<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle.<s%>
They <S%H8104>didn't<s%> keep <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H8451>law.<s%>
They <S%H7911>forgot<s%> his <S%H5949>doings,<s%> his wondrous <S%H5949>works<s%> that he had shown <S%H7200>them.<s%>
He <S%H6213>did<s%> marvelous <S%H6382>things<s%> in the <S%H5048>sight<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan.<s%>
He <S%H1234>split<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and caused them to pass <S%H5674>through.<s%> He made the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5324>stand<s%> as a <S%H5067>heap.<s%>
In the <S%H3119>daytime<s%> he also <S%H5148>led<s%> them with a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and all <S%H3915>night<s%> with a <S%H216>light<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>
He <S%H1234>split<s%> <S%H6697>rocks<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and gave them <S%H8248>drink<s%> abundantly as out of <S%H7227>the<s%> <S%H8415>depths.<s%>
He <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H5140>streams<s%> also out of the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and caused <S%H4325>waters<s%> to run <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>
Yet they <S%H3254>still<s%> went on to <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H4784>him,<s%> to rebel against the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> in the <S%H6723>desert.<s%>
They <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> in their <S%H3824>heart<s%> by <S%H7592>asking<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> according to their <S%H5315>desire.<s%>
<S%H1696>Yes,<s%> they spoke against <S%H430>God.<s%> They <S%H1696>said,<s%> <S%H3201>"Can<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6186>prepare<s%> a <S%H7979>table<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness?<s%>

<S%H5221>Behold,<s%> he struck the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> so that <S%H4325>waters<s%> gushed <S%H2100>out,<s%> and <S%H5158>streams<s%> <S%H7857>overflowed.<s%> <S%H3201>Can<s%> he <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3201>also?<s%> Will he <S%H3559>provide<s%> <S%H7607>flesh<s%> for his <S%H5971>people?<s%>"

Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8085>heard,<s%> and was <S%H5674>angry.<s%> A <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H5400>kindled<s%> against <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> also went <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>
because they <S%H539>didn't<s%> believe in <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H982>didn't<s%> trust in his <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
Yet he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H7834>skies<s%> <S%H4605>above,<s%> and <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
He rained <S%H4305>down<s%> <S%H4478>manna<s%> on them to <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H1715>food<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky.<s%>
<S%H376>Man<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H47>angels.<s%> He <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H3899>food<s%> to the <S%H7648>full.<s%>
He caused the east <S%H6921>wind<s%> to <S%H5265>blow<s%> in the <S%H8064>sky.<s%> By his <S%H5797>power<s%> he <S%H5090>guided<s%> the south <S%H8486>wind.<s%>
He <S%H4305>rained<s%> also <S%H7607>flesh<s%> on them as the <S%H6083>dust;<s%> <S%H3671>winged<s%> <S%H5775>birds<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas.<s%>
He let them <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of their <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> their <S%H4908>habitations.<s%>
So they <S%H398>ate,<s%> and were <S%H3966>well<s%> <S%H7646>filled.<s%> He <S%H935>gave<s%> them their own <S%H8378>desire.<s%>
They <S%H2114>didn't<s%> turn from their <S%H8378>cravings.<s%> Their <S%H400>food<s%> was yet in their <S%H6310>mouths,<s%>

when the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up against <S%H2026>them,<s%> killed some of their <S%H4924>fattest,<s%> and struck <S%H3766>down<s%> the <S%H970>young<s%> men of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
For all this they still <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and <S%H539>didn't<s%> believe in his wondrous <S%H6381>works.<s%>
Therefore he <S%H3615>consumed<s%> their <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> and their <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H928>terror.<s%>
When he <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H1875>them,<s%> then they inquired after <S%H7725>him.<s%> They returned and sought <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7836>earnestly.<s%>
They <S%H2142>remembered<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> was their <S%H6697>rock,<s%> the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> their <S%H1350>redeemer.<s%>
But they <S%H6601>flattered<s%> him with their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H3576>lied<s%> to him with their <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>
For their <S%H3820>heart<s%> was not <S%H3559>right<s%> with <S%H539>him,<s%> neither were they faithful in his <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

But <S%H7349>he,<s%> being merciful, <S%H3722>forgave<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H7843>didn't<s%> destroy <S%H7235>them.<s%> Yes, many times he <S%H7725>turned<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H7725>away,<s%> and <S%H5782>didn't<s%> stir up all his <S%H2534>wrath.<s%>
He <S%H2142>remembered<s%> that they were but <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> a <S%H7307>wind<s%> that passes <S%H1980>away,<s%> and <S%H7725>doesn't<s%> come again.
<S%H4100>How<s%> often they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against him in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H6087>grieved<s%> him in the <S%H3452>desert!<s%>
They <S%H7725>turned<s%> again and <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> and <S%H8428>provoked<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
They <S%H2142>didn't<s%> remember his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> nor the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> them from the <S%H6862>adversary;<s%>
how he <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H226>signs<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> his <S%H226>wonders<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6814>Zoan,<s%>
he <S%H2015>turned<s%> their <S%H2975>rivers<s%> into <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and their <S%H2975>streams,<s%> so that they could not <S%H8354>drink.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> among them swarms of <S%H6157>flies,<s%> which <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H6854>them;<s%> and frogs, which destroyed <S%H7843>them.<s%>
He <S%H5414>gave<s%> also their <S%H2981>increase<s%> to the <S%H2625>caterpillar,<s%> and their <S%H3018>labor<s%> to the <S%H697>locust.<s%>
He <S%H2026>destroyed<s%> their <S%H1612>vines<s%> with <S%H1259>hail,<s%> their sycamore fig <S%H8256>trees<s%> with <S%H2602>frost.<s%>
He gave <S%H5462>over<s%> their <S%H1165>livestock<s%> also to the <S%H1259>hail,<s%> and their <S%H4735>flocks<s%> to hot <S%H7565>thunderbolts.<s%>

He <S%H7971>threw<s%> on them the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> and <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> and a <S%H4917>band<s%> of <S%H4397>angels<s%> of <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

He <S%H6424>made<s%> a <S%H5410>path<s%> for his <S%H639>anger.<s%> He <S%H2820>didn't<s%> spare their <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death,<s%> but <S%H5462>gave<s%> their <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H5462>over<s%> to the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%>
and <S%H5221>struck<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of their <S%H202>strength<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham.<s%>
But he led <S%H5265>forth<s%> his own <S%H5971>people<s%> like <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H5090>guided<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> like a <S%H5739>flock.<s%>
He <S%H5148>led<s%> them <S%H983>safely,<s%> so that they <S%H6342>weren't<s%> afraid, but the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H3680>overwhelmed<s%> their <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
He <S%H935>brought<s%> them to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of his <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> to this <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> which his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> had <S%H7069>taken.<s%>

He also drove <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5307>them,<s%> allotted them for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> by <S%H2256>line,<s%> and made the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in their <S%H168>tents.<s%>
Yet they <S%H5254>tempted<s%> and <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H8104>didn't<s%> keep his <S%H5713>testimonies;<s%>
but turned <S%H5472>back,<s%> and dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> like their <S%H1>fathers.<s%> They were turned <S%H2015>aside<s%> like a <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> <S%H7198>bow.<s%>
For they provoked him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their high <S%H1116>places,<s%> and moved him to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with their engraved <S%H6456>images.<s%>
When <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5674>this,<s%> he was angry, and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3988>abhorred<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>
So that he <S%H5203>forsook<s%> the <S%H4908>tent<s%> of <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> the <S%H4908>tent<s%> which he <S%H7931>placed<s%> among <S%H120>men;<s%>
and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> his <S%H5797>strength<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> his <S%H8597>glory<s%> into the <S%H6862>adversary<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
He also <S%H5462>gave<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5462>over<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and was <S%H5674>angry<s%> with his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
<S%H784>Fire<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> their young <S%H970>men.<s%> Their <S%H1330>virgins<s%> had no wedding <S%H1984>song.<s%>
Their <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and their <S%H490>widows<s%> <S%H1058>couldn't<s%> weep.
Then the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3364>awakened<s%> as one out of <S%H3463>sleep,<s%> like a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> who <S%H7442>shouts<s%> by reason of <S%H3196>wine.<s%>
He <S%H5221>struck<s%> his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> <S%H268>backward.<s%> He <S%H5414>put<s%> them to a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>
Moreover he <S%H3988>rejected<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H977>didn't<s%> choose the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%>
But <S%H977>chose<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> which he <S%H157>loved.<s%>
He <S%H1129>built<s%> his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> like the <S%H7311>heights,<s%> like the <S%H776>earth<s%> which he has <S%H3245>established<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
He also <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> him from the <S%H4356>sheepfolds;<s%>

from <S%H310>following<s%> the ewes that have their <S%H5763>young,<s%> he <S%H935>brought<s%> him to be the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
So he was their <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> according to the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of his <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and <S%H5148>guided<s%> them by the <S%H8394>skillfulness<s%> of his <S%H3709>hands.<s%>
